dict.string: I get %lld score in Burst Balloon! Can you rely my CHALLENGE!!
I get %lld scores in Burst Balloon! Can you rely my CHALLENGE!!
Normal Balloon
I'm normal one, but we are the best! Every score is mine.
Boom Balloon
Be careful, your score will cry for me. If you click me, your score will be half off.
Time Balloon
Hey guy! You just got 3 seconds more.
Pump Balloon
So nice! Every press will increase normal balloon's score with 1 point in the screen.
Double Balloon
Every balloon will be double, sometime it made big trouble
Reverse Balloon
You know, we don't want meet you neither
Giant Balloon
You'll love the way you press... BOOM! HURRY UP!
Frozen Balloon
I love the ICE, but sometimes we will confuse you...
Endless Mode
Go go go!!!
Hey! Balloons is stuffed in your DEVICE, help me to release them, dada.....
wardrums.pokeballoon
Super Pump
pump item will increase your pump effect add one
More Time
time item will add 5 seconds to total time
